title: Songs of the Blessed Realm (1C61)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time you play an [Elven] tale, you may remove a burden.
Lore:	Elves seem to like music and poetry and tales as much as Hobbits like food.
Rarity:	C
